login_select_path: Select your path: Are you purpose-driven talent seeking to make an impact, or an organization driving change?
login_job_descr: Discover roles that matter and join forces with changemakers
login_hiring_descr: List opportunities and connect with talent who share your mission
login_review: Socious not only helped me secure my dream environmental job, but also boosted my salary and enabled me to make a positive impact.
login_email_code: We sent a verification link to {email}
login_username_guide: Lowercase letters, digits, '.', '_', and '-'; must be 6-24 characters.
login_sign_up: Sign up and start making an impact
login_terms_conditions: By continuing, you accept our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
login_your_verify_code: Hi {first name}, This is your verification code:
login_code_validity: This code will only be valid for the next 5 minutes. If the code does not work, you can use this login verification link:
login_email_sent_to: This email was sent to {email}. If you'd rather not receive this kind of email, you can unsubscribe or manage your email preferences. © 2023 Socious Inc., Nihonbashi 3-2-14-1F, Chuo-ku, Tokyo 103-0027, Japan
login_acc_success: Your account has been successfully created
login_names_null: If First Name, Last Name, Username are null, force users to show this screen so that all users have First Name, Last Name and Username.
login_user_hints: Username: Hint messages: "Must be between 6 and 24 characters." "Should begin with a lowercase letter." "Shouldn't start with a period or underscore." "No consecutive periods or underscores." "Can contain lowercase letters, digits, '.', '_', and '-'."
